website_summaries.verdict: It has all the usual "toys-to-life" bugbears, but Lego Dimensions is packed with great characters, clever puzzles and a physical experience you won't get anywhere else.
pros: Huge in scope, unwavering in its attention to detail and a perfect blend of virtual and physical, Lego Dimensions is the best "toys-to-life" has to offer
cons: The starter pack is more expensive than Skylanders or Infinity, and it can be hard to work out which extra characters to buy
The amount of physical interaction with the Toy Pad means you'll need to put some thought into where you play

customer_reviews.title: Character didn't work
customer_reviews.text: I sent this to my grandson. He loves it but one of the characters (lucy) did not work correctly and hes not happy. Apparently you cannot get lucy single or replaced. Grandma is not happy either. At this point
customer_reviews.author: Lynn martin

customer_reviews.title: Incomplete article
customer_reviews.text: Today I received my LEGO dimensions starter pack with a bonus included as shown in the box “Bonus Content Included” and above there is the original paper that says that it includes a free toy included, but it was not there, it looks like the box was opened and the additional toy was revomed. Some people can know that LEGO boxes only bring a single tape and this box was closed with double tape, and one from different type .
customer_reviews.author: glemile perez

customer_reviews.title: Not Packaged Correctly by Manufacturer
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, the wrong base for one of the characters was added to the purchase. This meant my kids have two Gandalf bases, but not one for the pink-haired chick they needed to play the game.
customer_reviews.author: 5171MilesBookBlog (Ashley)

customer_reviews.title: A great collecting base game.
customer_reviews.text: Once Disney Infinity closed down, I quickly needed a new collecting base game. Lego Dimensions is a great replacement for Infinity fans and is a way better game over all. Were infinity I normally would collect the figures and not really play the game, because they were boring, but with Lego games being way more fun, I feel like I'm getting my moneys worth now. As an adult I can connect more to the movies/tv licences that Lego brings to the table as oppose to Disney more kid focus themes. I love building each figures when I get them and upgrade each gadgets they come with.
customer_reviews.author: Alfred Contreras

customer_reviews.title: Good, lacking content for the price.
customer_reviews.text: It is a great game, lots of fun and works well. Only issue, my 8 yr old son won it in 2 days, so without buying additional content, the basic storyline was completed in ~20 hours. At $80-100 for the game I find this kind of ridicolous, all other lego games have over 100 hours of basic content.
customer_reviews.author: Disjointed

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as Infinity
customer_reviews.text: I got this because of the similarity to Disney Infinity (Love it). However, this has more of a strict direction (especially in the beginning). Whereas Infinity has more freedom. I will give it another shot someday...after all, it has Doctor Who!
customer_reviews.author: April Simmons

customer_reviews.title: This is a great game with a ton of expansion options
customer_reviews.text: This is a great game with a ton of expansion options. If your kids love lego's you can enjoy the game too because it has a lot of expansion kits that are 80's themed like Back to the future and Gremlins and Goonies!
customer_reviews.author: Aron

customer_reviews.title: Caution
customer_reviews.text: Pretty disapointed to have ordered a PS4 version and have this beat up Xbox One version show up.

customer_reviews.title: Great Family Time!!
customer_reviews.text: Love the Lego Games...this one kept me busy for a while.....yes I am older but I could play with the grandkids!!

customer_reviews.title: The wild style I received in this package is not ...
customer_reviews.text: The wild style I received in this package is not working and we cannot play the game properly without her.....Could someone please assist me in getting a new one because it’s difficult to begin the game without her!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Soraya

customer_reviews.title: Great game with fatal flaws
customer_reviews.text: Looks like it could have been a fun game, but it previously opened and damaged. The end of the USB cable torn out of cable. This game was sold and described as new, but was previously opened and damaged. I’d give zero stars if I could! It was for my daughter's birthday.

customer_reviews.text: Components do not work(Batman) which makes the whole set useless. I’ve tried contacting seller with no response. This was Christmas gift for my grandson... so disappointing

customer_reviews.title: It's the game that never ends! So fun!!!
customer_reviews.text: I got this game for my kids for Christmas. It's so much fun and there are so many packs you can buy to go with it. It's the game that never ends. Money well spent. I'd highly recommend it for adults as well. I have so much fun playing it with my kids! You also have to build the sets.

customer_reviews.text: This game is so great my son loves it, so many different fun characters and worlds. Watch for sales on different sets, better value.

customer_reviews.title: ... a Christmas gift for my sons and they absolutely love this. My boys love Lego's and building them
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for my sons and they absolutely love this. My boys love Lego's and building them, so this was perfect since you need to build the characters and other items within the game. We all love playing it. With characters like Ghostbusters, Dr. Who, Back to the Future....it's a definite winner in our household.

customer_reviews.title: Did not come complete
customer_reviews.text: Fun game for kids, my negative review is that our box did not come with the actual portal kit that you need to actually play the game. I had to order one separately. Waste of time and money and disappointed children on Christmas :(
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Jury still out
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was hoping for a more Disney infinity like sandbox type experience. Also some of the puzzles are a bit advanced for a younger kid. In fact, my wife and I have a hard time helping! I hope an update comes out to give a more customized end user experience and will update my review as we advance through the game.

customer_reviews.title: Item is as listed!
customer_reviews.text: My kiddos love this game! It came fast and as described

customer_reviews.title: Fun game for everyone!
customer_reviews.text: It is so much fun! Characters and pieces super easy to put together, plenty of extra pieces in case you lose them and a lot of space to attach extra pieces. Six base game levels in and I am having a great time! It even has a co-op mode if you want to play with another person.

customer_reviews.text: Thoroughly addictive, though wish you didn't have to by so many packs just to be able to complete a level. Worse that the 'Midway Retro Gamer Level Pack' won't be available until March 15, 2016.... meaning the level exists in game but can't access it until then.

customer_reviews.title: ... gift for my 9 year old nephew and he loved it! The lego pieces are small
customer_reviews.text: Got it as a birthday gift for my 9 year old nephew and he loved it ! The lego pieces are small.and care should taken when fitting it together as they may get lost, also it may require adult assistance to complete depending on age of child but its an all around rewarding experience when finished ( looks harder than it actually is). Great gift would recommend it for any young video game fan!

customer_reviews.title: Its just a good thing that all the puzzles and gameplay mechanics are ...
customer_reviews.text: TellTale has succeeded in creating digital Crack. This startup kit will be dangerous in the hands of the obsessive compulsive. Collecting the toys and collecting the studs and pieces within the game will be your one robotic goal.. Its just a good thing that all the puzzles and gameplay mechanics are very well polished, and enjoyable, since you will be doing the same functions repetitively.. TellTale still fails miserably at trying to introduce new gameplay puzzle devices in an intelligent way. People who've grown accustomed to this flaw in gameplay for 10 years now, dating back to Lego Starwars, will just take a deep breath and attempt to figure it out, while newcomers will be completely annoyed.
customer_reviews.author: MindChamber

customer_reviews.title: ... combination of real life LEGO and PS4 game is super. The product arrived quickly and its a lot ...

I would recommend having a vey safe and special place to put the blue character discs that aren't being used, bc they can get lost easily and can be upsetting.

customer_reviews.title: Really fun and worth it
customer_reviews.text: It's a really fun game, yes, out can be a bit of a money sink but most of the things you can use the "hire-a-hero" feature and just use the studs you've already gathered in the game. I like that they are adding level packs so you can keep going in the game with nothing but expansions in sight I think it was a great investment. I love the Lego video games and I think this is definitely my favorite because I can expand it so easily and get way more playtime out of it.

customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lego Dimensions is the new king in town!
customer_reviews.text: Much better than the other toys to life games. I have all and would rate it as follows based on the FUN factor that I had with my kid. 1. Lego Dimensions 2. Skylanders Superchargers 3. Disney Infinity 3.0 (sold it off on ebay. just no fun) So, if you're new to toys to life products, go with Lego Dimensions or Skylanders Superchargers. The latter maybe more appropriate for younger kids than Lego Dimensions. My suggestion would be age 5~9 (Skylanders) and age 7~99 (Lego Dimensions).
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Excellent game for any age.
customer_reviews.text: To be honest, I had extreme doubts about buying this game. The fact that you need to have a $100 dolar purchase from the get go was quite cumbersome for me. I had the luck of finding it on a convenient sale. The game does have its problems, but most of them involve actual building (specially fear for lost parts). Once that bump is over, the game is magnificent. The story is really good at involving all different franchises and offering an introduction to all of them. Playing this is actually quite fun, and famous franchises (eg. The Simpsons, or Doctor Who) have their own references to the actual series that people can enjoy regardless of the age.
customer_reviews.author: Fernando Pérez

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This has definitely kept me entertained, and it's cool that they continue to add on more level packs and add a whole new experience to the game instead of releasing individual titles every few months, just release pieces! I was never big into building legos, but this set definitely gets you going by building the main piece, adding it to the platform, and just having something cool to look at. I recommend this game and the Back to the Future level pack.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Hopkins

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for our son for Christmas! He absolutely loves it and he spent time putting it together as he played the game and he's had hours upon hours of enjoyment from this. I can see where it could get expensive buying more and more to go with it but he enjoys it so much and that makes all the difference in the world. If you have a PS4 and your child loves Batman and Legos, you can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Everything good except the batmobile doesn't read on the gamepad
customer_reviews.text: Everything good except the batmobile doesn't read on the gamepad. So I had to use another one I bought. So now I'm down one of the disc.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best!!
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter LOVES LOVES LOVES this game! She is a die hard lego fan, so getting to build everything just made her ecstatic. One word of caution to other parents there is a warning that comes up to keep other metal objects away from it.
customer_reviews.author: lisa

customer_reviews.title: A broken attempt at a game
customer_reviews.text: The game itself is fun enough but there are way too many bugs. I have multiple times been halfway through a level and it just stops and says that the game encountered an error. There's no way to get around this game breaking bug and you never have any idea of when it will occur. Besides that, to fully unlock this game you need to have some deep pockets as all of the expansions are expensive and some do relatively little for the price. It's insane that these games can cost so much and still be released so broken.
customer_reviews.author: Gift Card Recipient

customer_reviews.title: It's very cool that you can build the pieces with the paper ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a huge savings on Amazon from any local store. My son asked for it for his 6th birthday and he has played with it non-stop. Even my husband jumped in to play the game with him as well. It's very cool that you can build the pieces with the paper directions or with the game online as you can click through the directions on screen. It did not disappoint at all!
customer_reviews.author: deechicago

customer_reviews.title: Super fun and highly addictive
customer_reviews.text: Super fun and highly addictive. I found it nice to as interactive as it is. Lego video games are fun but this takes them to a whole new level. Definitely a must buy for Lego fans who will enjoy rebuilding their Lego vehicles and tools.
customer_reviews.author: Eric B. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Very very expensive.
customer_reviews.text: Extremely expensive. Very disappointed that I paid 99.00 last week and now the price for the game is reduced by 40.00. Very disappointed with Lego that they would make it cost prohibited for a child to Own. But it all about the money for them with this game. Every thing costs and it is confusing during game play with out a guide. This isn't like other Lego games where you can open up free play and play over and over. All levels require you purchase characters, level and game packs.

customer_reviews.title: Great for All Ages!
customer_reviews.text: Lego Dimensions is a game every age can enjoy. This is game is one that can be played over and over without boredom, since you can purchase separate Lego figures to interact with the game. Great price for the amount of playing time. Graphics are clear and pleasant to view. This arrived quickly and I would recommend this game to any Lego lover!

customer_reviews.title: I love this game
customer_reviews.text: I love this game. IT's like the Disney infinity of the lego world. I am bad at video games but it's a game that my husband and I can enjoy together.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this game
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this game. I bought this for my son for his birthday as he is a big Lego fan. I enjoy playing with him and think it's fantastic that you can have so many different characters and worlds. It reminds me of Skylanders (which is also a huge hit in my house). The only complaint I have is that I wished there had been some sort of directions included...even it was just a simple begin game to learn more. As I struggled for a bit trying to figure out what we were supposed to do once we took everything out of the box. Looking forward to all the new packs that will be coming out!

customer_reviews.title: Still great after a year
customer_reviews.text: Even after a year, this is still amazing and gets lots of use. Disney Infinity and Skylanders can't even come close to the awesomeness of Lego Dimensions.

customer_reviews.title: I'm disappointed with the way the product was shipped I work ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm disappointed with the way the product was shipped I work at Amazon and I know the product should have been shipped in a Amazon box or unmarked not the actual game package i am just thankful my children wasn't home this was a Santa gift and the surprise would've been spoiled also thankful the package wasn't damaged
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Michelle Colvin

product_meta.title: LEGO Dimensions Starter Pack - PlayStation 4
product_meta.description:
Color:Original VersionWhen a mysterious and powerful vortex suddenly appears in various LEGO worlds, different characters from DC Comics, The Lord of the Rings and The LEGO Movie are swept away. To save their friends, Batman, Gandalf and Wyldstyle bravely jump into the vortex and quickly find themselves fighting to save all of LEGO humanity. Let creativity be the guide to a building and gaming adventure - journey through unexpected worlds and team-up with unlikely allies on the quest to defeat the evil Lord Vortech. Play with different from different worlds together in one LEGO videogame, and use each other's vehicles and gadgets in a way never before possible. LEGO Bad Cop driving the DeLorean Time Machine. Why not?! The LEGO Ninja go Masters of Spinjitsu fighting alongside Wonder Woman...yes, please! Get ready to break the rules, because the only rule with LEGO Dimensions is that there are no rules.

The LEGO DIMENSIONS Starter Pack has everything you need to set out on epic mash-up adventures filled with iconic worlds and unlikely allies as you’ve never seen them before. Build the minifigure heroes and fire-up the game to start the experience, then follow the in-game build instructions to assemble the loose bricks into the LEGO Gateway, and place the structure on the LEGO Toy Pad. There’s a whole multiverse of puzzles to solve, and challenges and enemies to face, and when you’re ready for more, collect level, team & fun packs to expand your collection. Use whatever minifigure with whichever vehicle or gadget – go ahead… break the rules!
feature_bullets: LEGO characters from a mix of some of the best brands in the universe join forces and battle in worlds outside of their own. A Dark Knight, a Wizard, and a LEGO Master Builder traveling together down the Yellow Brick Road is just the beginning.
By purchasing additional expansion packs, players can grow their collection with a variety of their favorite brands to create even more crazy combinations.
Bring up to seven , vehicles and/or gadgets into the game all at once by dropping them on the LEGO Toy Pad for the most exciting and action-filled game around.
Players can let imagination guide their solo journey or have a friend join the adventure with co-operative, drop-in/drop-out play.
LEGO Dimensions is a system of play that offers continued compatibility - everything bought today or expanded with tomorrow will continue to work.
